name: Automated Laser Defense Turrets VS Geometry
name_original: Automated Laser Defense Turrets VS Geometry
description:
This is just a goofy side project of mine about building up an unstoppable defensive force in a geometric war. Like *those* mobile game ads but... you know... good.

Controls:

A/D - Turn Primary Turret

E - Spawn Basic Turret (Needs 5 Pts)

W - Spawn Popcorn Turret (Needs 10 Pts)

Q - Spawn Sniper Turret (Needs 15 Pts)

S - Spawn Trebuchet (Needs 20 Pts)
